synopsis.text: Are you ready for a dazzling journey through the cosmos? Meet Hoshina Hikaru, an ordinary stargazer who is suddenly thrust into an extraordinary adventure when the fabric of space warps before her eyes! Alongside Piton, a determined factory worker, and a team of courageous Star Twinkle Precures, Hikaru finds herself on the Miracle Planet, where the precious Miracle Lights are created. However, darkness looms as a catastrophic accident causes the stars to vanish and the planet to be swallowed by shadows. With the fate of the universe hanging in the balance, can this unlikely group of heroes restore the light and unravel the mystery behind the calamity? Join Hikaru and her newfound friends as they embark on a breathtaking quest to save the cosmos from an all-consuming darkness, all while uncovering the secrets of the enigmatic Miracle Planet. Your support could make all the difference in their stellar battle!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
